description: Schema for provenance of single lines

pageUrl.description: URL of the page (resp. URL the PAGE-XML file)

imageUrl.description: URL of the image (resp. the `pg:imageFilename` in the PAGE-XML file)

bagUrl.description: URL of the bag that contains the page

metsUrl.description: URL of the METS document that contains the page

lineId.description: ID of the line within the PAGE-XML doc

xpath.description: XPath to the line if no `fileId` was provided
